history.proof: intros p. induction p. - hauto lq: on depth: 3. - qsimpl use: pluspf_inv3b,eqp_refl.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Unable to unify "forall x : list (Term ?M1837 ?M1847), eqP ?M1837 ?M1840 ?M1847 x x" with "eqP A eqA n (projsig1 (list (Term A n)) (fun a : list (Term A n) => plusP (pO A n) nil a) (plusp (pO A n, nil))) nil".

original: intros p. induction p. - unfold pluspf. simpl. apply eqp_refl. - simpl. rewrite pluspf_inv3b. + apply IHp. + apply plusTerm_com. apply eqT_refl. + intros contra. inversion contra.
